details: We have successfully deployed the bi-partisan roastmaster. The parents will never see it coming.

arts.title: Review: Modern Art
arts.body: I saw a dot on a canvas. I barked at it. It didn't move. Derivative.

horoscope: Leo: Your hair looks ridiculous. Fix it.

pitd.contenders: Remy Senior vs. An Empty Bowl

agony: You think you have problems? I have fleas older than you.
